item.title: RedHat File and Directory Permissions
item.description: Hi! While applying STIGs to a RHEL7 system I needed to verify permissions on every file & folder inside each user’s home directory. Finding ID V-204473 states “The Red Hat Enterprise Linux operating system must be configured so that all files and directories contained in local interactive user home directories have a mode of 0750 or less permissive.” If any files are found with a mode more permissive than 0750, this is a finding.
